bill.title: House Substitute for SB 416 by Committee on Commerce and Economic Development -- Secretary of Labor, employment security law; workplace safety program, employment standards, labor and wage dispute.
bill.description: House Substitute for SB 416 by Committee on Commerce and Economic Development -- Secretary of Labor, employment security law; workplace safety program, employment standards, labor and wage dispute.

history.action: Introduced
Referred to Committee on Commerce
Hearing: Wednesday, February 15, 2012, 8:30 AM Room 548-S
Committee Report recommending bill be passed by Committee on Commerce
Committee of the Whole - Be passed
Emergency Final Action - Passed;  Yea: 40 Nay: 0
Received and Introduced
Referred to Committee on Commerce and Economic Development
Hearing: Tuesday, March 13, 2012, 1:30 PM Room 785 Docking
Hearing: Thursday, March 15, 2012, 1:30 PM Room 785 Docking
Committee Report recommending substitute bill be passed by Committee on Commerce and Economic Development
Committee of the Whole - Passed over and retain a place on the calendar
Committee of the Whole - Committee Report be adopted recommending substitute bill be passed
Committee of the Whole - Substitute bill be passed
Emergency Final Action - Substitute passed;  Yea: 85 Nay: 37
Nonconcurred with amendments; Conference Committee requested; appointed Senator Wagle , Senator Lynn and Senator Holland as conferees
Motion to accede adopted;  Representative Brown,  Representative Suellentrop and  Representative Slattery appointed as conferees
Representative Kleeb replaces  Representative Brown on the Conference Committee
Representative Frownfelter replaces  Representative Slattery on the Conference Committee
Motion to suspend Joint Rule 4 (k) to allow consideration adopted;
Motion to concur with amendments in conference failed;  Yea: 14 Nay: 22 (Remains in Conference)
Representative Kinzer replaces  Representative Kleeb on the Conference Committee
Representative Patton replaces  Representative Suellentrop on the Conference Committee
Representative Pauls replaces  Representative Frownfelter on the Conference Committee
Motion to suspend Joint Rule 4 (k) to allow consideration adopted;
Conference Committee Report agree to disagree adopted;  Representative Kinzer,  Representative Patton and  Representative Pauls appointed as second conferees
Conference Committee Report agree to disagree adopted;  Senator Wagle,  Senator Lynn and  Senator Holland appointed as second conferees
Conference committee report now available
Conference Committee Report was adopted;  Yea: 91 Nay: 18
Call of the Senate.
Call of the Senate lifted.
Conference Committee Report not adopted;  Yea: 19 Nay: 16

votes.desc: Senate Emergency Final Action - Passed - Yea: 40 Nay: 0

Senate Conference Committee Report not adopted - Yea: 19 Nay: 16
